value:
My mother is still alive... I know it.
She may not recognize me, but...
I will meet her again someday!

Lord Seliph and Prince Shannan will
return the country to how it should
be. That is why I fight.

Have you eaten? ...And gotten a good
night's sleep? You must be sure to
take good care of yourself!

The prince treats me like a child,
disallowing me from joining in real
battles often—but I've trained plenty!

The empire has hunted down many
friends of mine...treating them like
animals. Well, I'm done running!

I am here to ask you to please
continue working closely with
our $Nf!

My technique is the pride of Isaach!
Astra—the art handed down from
Sword Saint Od!

Counterattack and pursue...
Our enemies will not escape!

Ugh... Forgive me, Mother... Forgive
me, Prince Shannan!

Ah! It seems this new power will
come naturally to me... Let me show
you how useful I can be!

My name is Larcei! I may not look it,
but I am a full-fledged swordmaster!
Just you watch!

You confuse me! I have never seen
you on the battlefield, yet everyone
keeps saying they need you.$k$pI wanted that for myself... I learned to
use a sword so I could fight and help
Prince Shannan and Lord Seliph...$k$pPrince Shannan told me I remind him
of my mother, Ayra, on the field. He
said she was strong and beautiful...$k$pEr...anyway! I've decided I will act as
your older sister—to help you out!
It will help you be happier, right?$k$pOh! You think younger sister would
be more fitting? Hmph. I suppose...
Either way, I'll be right by your side!
はあっ
でやあっ
うっ…
Not yet...!
You beast!
I'll defeat you where you stand!
It's over for you!
I'll never forget their sacrifice!
Ugh...so this is death?
Ahaha
I'm Larcei. Nice to meet you!
Now you've done it! You're gonna regret that!

Hmph. Shannan still treats me
like a child, you know.
Let the enemy come to us! Less hassle, more battle!
I've trained plenty. Let me in on some real fighting already!
I know my mother is alive... I won't let anyone say otherwise.
If it helps you out, I guess I can lend a hand.
I won't let them get away!
Alright...
Leave it to me!
